item.title: Tape Down Denim Shirt
item.dc:creator: ftbronx
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439576149970{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background: #1b1b1b url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail3838.jpg?id=1196) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="row-1"][vc_column][thb_image animation="animation fade-in" alignment="center" image="1096" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_padding="false" row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312456212{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-3.jpg?id=1101) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318845877{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]

Original Hipster Shoes

Los Angeles-based STAMPD partners with Vans OTW to release an all new rendition of the Tesella silhouette, which exudes high quality and West coast vibes. The Tesella's hand woven upper is constructed of a supple black calf leather. Vans-patented UltraCush Lite technology is applied to the midsole and footbed, effectively reducing weight, while providing immense comfort. The lightweight foam midsole is white with black speckle detailing, while the outsole features a waffle-tread.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439318956453{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-4.jpg?id=1103) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439318948044{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"]

Extraordinary Design

Overhearing the indignant but half-humorous cries with which the people on deck began to drive the coffin away, Queequeg, to every one's consternation, commanded that the thing should be instantly brought to him, nor was there any denying him; seeing that, of all mortals, some dying men are the most tyrannical; and certainly, since they will shortly trouble us so little for evermore, the poor fellows ought. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312437110{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-5.jpg?id=1105) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439318939063{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318929124{padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Color Variations

Leaning over in his hammock, Queequeg long regarded the coffin with an attentive eye. He then called for his harpoon, had the wooden stock drawn from it, and then had the iron part placed in the coffin along with one of the paddles of his boat. All by his own request, also, biscuits were then ranged round the sides within: a flask of fresh water was placed at the head. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="row-5" css=".vc_custom_1439315824456{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column][thb_image alignment="center" image="1109"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" el_class="row-6" css=".vc_custom_1439315833862{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-7.jpg?id=1111) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column el_class="text-center"][vc_column_text]

Accessories

Drawing inspiration from warm, carefree and seemingly endless days of adventure, Herschel Supply presents the Summer 2015 Bags Collection.[/vc_column_text][thb_gap height="35"][thb_button link="#" color="white-transparent" animation="animation bottom-to-top"]VIEW COLLECTION[/thb_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

The Tesella's hand woven upper is constructed of a supple black calf leather. Vans-patented UltraCush Lite technology is applied to the midsole and footbed, effectively reducing weight, while providing immense comfort. The lightweight foam midsole is white with black speckle detailing, while the outsole features a waffle-tread.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439318956453{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-4.jpg?id=1103) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439318948044{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"]

Extraordinary Design

Overhearing the indignant but half-humorous cries with which the people on deck began to drive the coffin away, Queequeg, to every one's consternation, commanded that the thing should be instantly brought to him, nor was there any denying him; seeing that, of all mortals, some dying men are the most tyrannical; and certainly, since they will shortly trouble us so little for evermore, the poor fellows ought. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312437110{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-5.jpg?id=1105) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439318939063{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318929124{padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Color Variations

Leaning over in his hammock, Queequeg long regarded the coffin with an attentive eye. He then called for his harpoon, had the wooden stock drawn from it, and then had the iron part placed in the coffin along with one of the paddles of his boat. All by his own request, also, biscuits were then ranged round the sides within: a flask of fresh water was placed at the head. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="row-5" css=".vc_custom_1439315824456{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column][thb_image alignment="center" image="1109"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" el_class="row-6" css=".vc_custom_1439315833862{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-7.jpg?id=1111) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column el_class="text-center"][vc_column_text]

Accessories

Drawing inspiration from warm, carefree and seemingly endless days of adventure, Herschel Supply presents the Summer 2015 Bags Collection.[/vc_column_text][thb_gap height="35"][thb_button link="#" color="white-transparent" animation="animation bottom-to-top"]VIEW COLLECTION[/thb_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439576149970{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background: #1b1b1b url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail3838.jpg?id=1196) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="row-1"][vc_column][thb_image animation="animation fade-in" alignment="center" image="1096" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_padding="false" row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312456212{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-3.jpg?id=1101) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318845877{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]

Original Hipster Shoes

Los Angeles-based STAMPD partners with Vans OTW to release an all new rendition of the Tesella silhouette, which exudes high quality and West coast vibes. The Tesella's hand woven upper is constructed of a supple black calf leather. Vans-patented UltraCush Lite technology is applied to the midsole and footbed, effectively reducing weight, while providing immense comfort. The lightweight foam midsole is white with black speckle detailing, while the outsole features a waffle-tread.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439318956453{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-4.jpg?id=1103) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439318948044{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"]

Extraordinary Design

Overhearing the indignant but half-humorous cries with which the people on deck began to drive the coffin away, Queequeg, to every one's consternation, commanded that the thing should be instantly brought to him, nor was there any denying him; seeing that, of all mortals, some dying men are the most tyrannical; and certainly, since they will shortly trouble us so little for evermore, the poor fellows ought. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312437110{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-5.jpg?id=1105) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439318939063{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318929124{padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Color Variations

Leaning over in his hammock, Queequeg long regarded the coffin with an attentive eye. He then called for his harpoon, had the wooden stock drawn from it, and then had the iron part placed in the coffin along with one of the paddles of his boat. All by his own request, also, biscuits were then ranged round the sides within: a flask of fresh water was placed at the head. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="row-5" css=".vc_custom_1439315824456{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column][thb_image alignment="center" image="1109"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" el_class="row-6" css=".vc_custom_1439315833862{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-7.jpg?id=1111) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column el_class="text-center"][vc_column_text]

Accessories

Drawing inspiration from warm, carefree and seemingly endless days of adventure, Herschel Supply presents the Summer 2015 Bags Collection.[/vc_column_text][thb_gap height="35"][thb_button link="#" color="white-transparent" animation="animation bottom-to-top"]VIEW COLLECTION[/thb_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Portrait Dress
item.dc:creator: ftbronx
item.excerpt:encoded: From Finders Keepers, a soft stretch, mid-weight short sleeve dress with allover geometric and floral print in dark navy and white. Features crew neckline, clean unfinished sleeve and hem edges, rounded hem, flare skirt cut, high-low hem, side pockets, dropped waist back design, invisible back zipper and relaxed fit through body.

item.excerpt:encoded: From Visvim, handmade beige leather chukka boot. Features vegetable tanned suede uppers, antique brass eyelets, brown leather laces, unlined, TPU heel stabilizer, rubber sole and extra cloth laces.

item.title: Bomholt in Navy
item.dc:creator: ftbronx
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439383010400{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #fbfbfb !important;}" el_class="first-row"][vc_column][vc_row_inner max_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1439383117742{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6"][vc_column_text]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439576149970{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background: #1b1b1b url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail3838.jpg?id=1196) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="row-1"][vc_column][thb_image animation="animation fade-in" alignment="center" image="1096" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_padding="false" row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312456212{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-3.jpg?id=1101) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318845877{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]

Original Hipster Shoes

Los Angeles-based STAMPD partners with Vans OTW to release an all new rendition of the Tesella silhouette, which exudes high quality and West coast vibes. The Tesella's hand woven upper is constructed of a supple black calf leather. Vans-patented UltraCush Lite technology is applied to the midsole and footbed, effectively reducing weight, while providing immense comfort. The lightweight foam midsole is white with black speckle detailing, while the outsole features a waffle-tread.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" css=".vc_custom_1439318956453{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-4.jpg?id=1103) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1439318948044{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"]

Extraordinary Design

Overhearing the indignant but half-humorous cries with which the people on deck began to drive the coffin away, Queequeg, to every one's consternation, commanded that the thing should be instantly brought to him, nor was there any denying him; seeing that, of all mortals, some dying men are the most tyrannical; and certainly, since they will shortly trouble us so little for evermore, the poor fellows ought. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding="true" thb_full_width="true" equal_height="true"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439312437110{background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-5.jpg?id=1105) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439318939063{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text el_class=".column-padding-1" css=".vc_custom_1439318929124{padding-top: 25% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 25% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"]

Color Variations

Leaning over in his hammock, Queequeg long regarded the coffin with an attentive eye. He then called for his harpoon, had the wooden stock drawn from it, and then had the iron part placed in the coffin along with one of the paddles of his boat. All by his own request, also, biscuits were then ranged round the sides within: a flask of fresh water was placed at the head. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="row-5" css=".vc_custom_1439315824456{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column][thb_image alignment="center" image="1109"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row thb_full_width="true" el_class="row-6" css=".vc_custom_1439315833862{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(http://bronx.fuelthemes.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/2-detail-7.jpg?id=1111) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column el_class="text-center"][vc_column_text]

item.excerpt:encoded: Flat front chino pants from Obey in a durable cotton-poly twill with gentle stretch throughout. Features two front hand pockets, two back waist pockets, and button closure with a zip fly.
